docs.snippet: Wisconsin-Whitewater did something no university in N.C.A.A. history had ever accomplished: win national championships in football, men’s basketball and baseball in one school year....
docs.lead_paragraph: Wisconsin-Whitewater did something no university in N.C.A.A. history had ever accomplished: win national championships in football, men’s basketball and baseball in one school year.
docs.abstract: University of Wisconsin-Whitewater wins national championships in football, men's basketball and baseball in a single year, something no university in NCAA history has ever accomplished; odds of Division III school accomplishing feat were 1 in 38,618,370.

headline.seo: Wisconsin-Whitewater Is N.C.A.A. Division III Champion in Three Sports
headline.main: In Southern Wisconsin, a Winner Takes All
headline.print_headline: In Southern Wisconsin, a Winner Takes All
